attributes.action: 51 sqn raf regiment gunners at risk of dismissal from HM Forces
attributes.additional_details: Family members are worried that there son's  both members of 51 sqn RAF Regiment will be made examples  and dismissed from HM  Forces for photographs that where taken  after the attack at camp bastion  in 2012.The two gunners  did not commit war crimes nor broke rules regarding  taking photographs and did not disrespect the dead taliban in anyway.And should be allowed to continue to serve there country  and unit without any unjust pressure. Per Ardua
